issue.title: [C++] Validate enum-style CMake options
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9013](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9013). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It seems that some CMake options silently allow invalid values, such as `-DARROW_SIMD_LEVEL=foobar`. We should validate inputs to avoid typos (such as "SSE42" instead of "SSE4_2").
